title: Virtual World-Based Experiential Learning Design: Strengthening Scientific Communication Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic scientific theories and practical experience in the field of science
context.additional_context: Non-linear learning activities in a virtual environment (similar to Second Life platform) using digital devices.

learning_goals: Design and execute three or more collaborative strategies for scientific problem-solving in virtual world simulations.
Apply two or more scientific communication frameworks through experiential learning in 3D virtual environments.
Analyzing virtual world activity logs to create self-assessment reports on learning achievement
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
